Device.resolution: ERoT will try to recover AP by a reset/reboot. If there is still a problem, collect ERoT logs and reflash AP firmware with recovery flow. If the problem persists, isolate the server for RMA evaluation.
ERoT will try to recover AP by a reset/reboot. If there is still a problem, collect ERoT logs and reflash AP firmware with recovery flow.
Collect ERoT logs and isolate the server for RMA evaluation.

Device.event: GPU GPU THERM_OVERT_INT Abnormal State Change
Device.resolution: A thermal interrupt was triggered. Power off the Baseboard within 1 second, and GPU will shutdown autonomously. Check thermal environment to ensure the GPU operates within thermal specifications and power cycle the Baseboard to recover.

Device.event: GPU GPU THERM_WARN_INT Abnormal State Change
Device.resolution: Increase the Baseboard cooling and check thermal environment to ensure the PCB Temperature reading is under UpperCritical threshold.

Device.event: CPU CPU THERM_OVERT_INT Abnormal State Change
Device.resolution: A thermal interrupt was triggered. Power off the Baseboard within 1 second, and CPU will shutdown autonomously. Check thermal environment to ensure the CPU operates within thermal specifications and power cycle the Baseboard to recover.

Device.event: CPU CPU THERM_WARN_INT Abnormal State Change
Device.resolution: Increase the Baseboard cooling and check thermal environment to ensure the PCB Temperature reading is under UpperCritical threshold.

Device.event: ERoT_CPU CPU EROT_FATAL_ERR_INT Abnormal State Change
Device.resolution: Talk to ERoT directly via MCTP vendor command to triage. For details, please refer to the section ERoT Fatal Troubleshooting" of the latest NVIDIA Oberon Error Reporting (NVOnline: xxxxxxx). - TBD"

Device.event: PCBTempSensor PCB TEMP_ALERT_INT Abnormal State Change
Device.resolution: Increase the Baseboard cooling and check thermal environment to ensure the PCB Temperature reading is under UpperCritical threshold.

Device.event: ERoT_FPGA FPGA_EROT SPI_ERR_INT Abnormal State Change
Device.resolution: AC cycle the system. If problem persists, collect all dumps per troubleshooting guide, isolate the system and evaluate for RMA.

Device.event: ERoT_CPU EROT SPI_ERR_CPU_INT Abnormal State Change
Device.resolution: AC cycle the system. If problem persists, collect all dumps per troubleshooting guide, isolate the system and evaluate for RMA.
AC cycle the system. If problem persists, collect all dumps per troubleshooting guide, isolate the system and evaluate for RMA.
Device.description: FPGA report of all power registers. RF event reports all power registers with status. For all possible power registers monitored via this event please see the accompying release not document.

Device.event: GPU SRAM ECC uncorrectable error count exceed threshold
Device.resolution: Reset the GPU. If the GPU continues to exhibit the problem, isolate the GPU module for RMA evaluation.
Device.description: GPU has encountered SRAM ECC Uncorrectable error count exceeded threshold.

Device.resolution: No immediate recovery required. Reset the GPU at the next service window, since the process of row-remapping requires a GPU reset to take effect and will remain persistent throughout the life of the GPU.
Device.description: A row-remapping is pending and will happen at the next GPU reset.

Device.resolution: Isolate the server for RMA evaluation.
Reset the GPU or power cycle the Baseboard. If problem persists, isolate the server for RMA evaluation.
Device.description: GPU has experienced a failure on one NVLink connection to an NVSwitch.

Device.resolution: Start recovery flow with the recovery image (Refer to Device Firmware Recovery section of NVIDIA Blackwell HGX 8-GPU Baseboard Firmware Update and Security Guide). If failed persistently, collecting all IRoT dumps and isolate the server for RMA evaluation.
